definition: three items/three events/three terms/tri-/trinomial, ternary (math.)/triathlon (abbr. for 三項全能|三项全能)
back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc

sentences.english: I think I'll participate in the triathlon with my old, one-speed bicycle.
sentences.chinese: 我想用平時賣東西時用的自行車去參加鐵人三項賽。

sentences.english: He was 15 years old. Now 31, Phelps still holds three world records.
sentences.chinese: 現年31歲的菲爾普斯仍保持着三項世界記錄。

sentences.english: Paul had three specific requests in verses 31, 32.
sentences.chinese: 保羅在第31和32節提出三項明確的代禱要求。

sentences.english: Yet, this is only the first of three-planned phases of construction on the east and central legs. The government has been advised to wait and see the results before proceeding further.
sentences.chinese: 而這只是東段和中段三項施工計劃中的第一步。

sentences.english: All these three techniques are important methods for increasing yield of medium thick plate.
sentences.chinese: 這三項技術是提高中厚板成材率的重要手段。

sentences.english: Six contestants, three stunts, one winner.
sentences.chinese: 六名選手，三項特技，唯有一名勝者。

sentences.english: Stir first three ingredients with ice and strain into glass, then top up with Champagne and lightly stir.
sentences.chinese: 前三項加冰攪合，濾入杯子，倒適量香檳後輕輕攪拌。

sentences.english: Exp: I hear you're a triathlete now?
sentences.chinese: 我聽說妳是“鐵人三項”的一份子了？

sentences.english: A triathlete's stride is critical to his or her running performance.
sentences.chinese: 鐵人三項的步伐對於他或她的跑步成績至關重要。

sentences.english: When the campaign for technical innovations started, he proposed three items.
sentences.chinese: 技術革新運動開始時，他提出了三項建議。

sentences.english: Hawaii challenges the fittest to survive its Ironman triathlon.
sentences.chinese: 夏威夷邀請最合適的選手參賽，以保存其鐵人三項賽。

sentences.english: Maybe I would have been a triathlete .
sentences.chinese: 也許我已是三項運動家。

sentences.english: My goal this year is to complete an Olympic-distance triathlon.
sentences.chinese: 我今年的目標是完成一次奧運會距離的鐵人三項。

sentences.english: Triathlons are hard because you have to perform back-to-back events.
sentences.chinese: 鐵人三項很困難，因爲選手要進行連續的項目。

sentences.english: Shanghai Triathlon Club reserves all rights on the explanation of this brochure.
sentences.chinese: 本規程解釋權歸上海鐵人三項運動俱樂部所有。

sentences.english: Jiang Wenli more with Golden Eagle TV Festival The show won three awards.
sentences.chinese: 蔣雯麗更憑藉此劇在金鷹電視節包攬三項大獎。

definition: back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc
to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
to target/to focus on/to be aimed at or against/in response to
to report (to the authorities)/to declare (to customs)
